name: Vegan TLT Sandwich (BLT Substitute)
author: 5Tami2
summary: This is an awesome vegan summer sandwich recipe. The tofu slices could also be put in salads, as a side to scrambles, in vegan pasta salads, etc. Enjoy!
ingredients: 2 tablespoons steak seasoning (such as Penzeys Mitchell Street Steak Seasoning), divided
2 tablespoons vegetable oil, or more as needed
4 tablespoons vegan mayonnaise, or to taste
directions: Gently pat tofu dry with paper towels
Slice into 1/8-inch thick slices right onto dry paper towels
Generously season one side with 1 tablespoon steak seasoning
Heat oil in a nonstick skillet over medium heat
Carefully slip tofu, seasoned-side down, into the pan using a small spatula
Season the top side with the remaining steak seasoning
Cook tofu until dried and lightly browned, 4 to 5 minutes per side
Spread mayonnaise over each slice of bread
Divide tofu, tomatoes, and lettuce over 4 slices; cover with the tops
